caption.p: Targeted genes and corresponding oligonucleotide sequences used in RT-PCR

tr.td: P1 (codes for protein involved in virus replication)

td.p: P1_FW: 5′-ATG GCA ACT TAC ACA TCA ACA ATC CAG-3′
P1_R: 5′-TTA TTG AGT AAC CTT GGA ACG TGC ATC A-3′

tr.td: P3 (codes for protein involved in virus replication)

td.p: P3_FW: 5′-ATG GGT ATT CCT AAT GCA TGC CCT-3′
P3_R: 5′-TTA CTG GTG TCG CAC ATC ATA TTC TTC C-3′

tr.td: NIa (codes for a serine-like cysteine protease)

td.p: NIa_FW: 5′-ATG GCC AAA TCA CTC ATG AGA GGT TTA AG-3′
NIa_R: 5′-TTA TTG CTC TAC AAC AAC ATC ATG ATC AAT TAA ATC C-3′
CP_FW: 5′-ATG GGA AAT GAC ACA ATC GAT-3′
CP_R: 5′-TCA CAT GTT CTT GAC TCC AA-3′

table-wrap-foot.p: All oligonucleotides were designed within presented study. All oligonucleotides were purchased from Integrated DNA Technologies, USA
FW forward oligonucleotides, R reverse oligonucleotides
